Habit number one: Have an irrational hatred towards other coffee brands.
Habit number two: Share your misspelled names on Instagram.
For example: Michelle, Ingrid, Erin, Amy and last but not least, Ann Louise.
Habit number three: Flaunt your gold membership card.
Habit number four: Be eager to try new specialty drinks.
Habit number five: Be OCD about lining up the sleeve and cup logos together.
